text: How do you think conflicts should be resolved in a relationship?

options.text: Talk it out immediately, no matter how heated it gets. 🗣️
Take some time apart to cool down, then discuss rationally. ❄️
One of us should compromise to keep the peace. ⚖️
Let’s sleep on it and revisit when we’re calmer. 🌙

text: Which quality is most important in a long-term relationship?

options.text: Trust—without it, there’s nothing. 🤝
Emotional connection—we should always understand each other. ❤️
Shared goals—we need to be heading in the same direction. 🎯
Independence—love should allow personal growth too. 🌱

text: When making a big decision together, how should we approach it?

options.text: Make a logical pros and cons list. 📊
Trust our instincts and go with what feels right. ✨
Let the person most affected by the decision take the lead. 🔄
Debate until we both reach a common ground. ⚖️

text: What’s the best way to maintain a strong relationship over time?

options.text: Regular deep conversations to stay connected. 💬
Having shared experiences and adventures. ✈️
Giving each other space and independence. 🚀
Keeping romance and effort alive. 💖

text: Which of the following situations would challenge our relationship the most?

options.text: Long-distance for a year. 🌍
Financial struggles. 💰
One of us changing career paths drastically. 🔄
Disagreeing on major life goals. 🎯

text: How do you prefer to express love?

options.text: Through words—saying “I love you” often. 💬
Through actions—doing thoughtful things. 🎁
Through physical closeness—hugs, cuddles, and kisses. 🤗
Through quality time—being fully present with each other. ⏳

text: If one of us had a dream opportunity in another country, what should we do?

options.text: Support them and find a way to make it work. 🌏
Consider moving together if possible. ✈️
Have a long-distance relationship and see how it goes. 💻
Prioritize the relationship and discuss what’s best for both. 💬

text: What kind of balance do you think is ideal in a relationship?

options.text: We should do almost everything together. 💑
We should have a mix of togetherness and independence. ⚖️
We should have individual lives but strong emotional connection. 🔗
It should depend on the stage of the relationship. 🔄

text: Which of these challenges would we most likely argue about?

options.text: Different communication styles. 🗣️
Handling finances differently. 💳
Different expectations for the future. 🔮
Not spending enough quality time together. ⏳

text: If we had to define our relationship in one word, what would it be?

options.text: Balanced ⚖️
Exciting 🎢
Supportive 🤝
Evolving 🔄
